name: digital-canvas/newrelic-api-php-sdk
description: PHP implementation of the New Relic API

suggest.guzzle/guzzle: Use guzzle for making http requests.
suggest.zendframework/zend-http: Use ZF2 Zend\HTTP for making http requests.
suggest.zendframework/zendframework1: Use Zend_HTTP_Client for making http requests.
